# hitachi_vsp_one_volume_qos (Data Source)

VSP Storage Volume QoS: It returns the QoS settings for a specific storage volume.

## Example Usage

```terraform
#
# Hitachi VSP One Volume QoS Information Retrieval
#
# This section defines a data source block that retrieves the QoS (Quality of Service)
# settings for a specific volume managed by Hitachi storage systems through the
# Virtual Storage Platform One Block Administrator.
#
# The "hitachi_vsp_one_volume_qos" data source allows you to access QoS configuration
# details of an existing volume, enabling you to reference these settings in
# Terraform configurations and automate resource management based on QoS policies.
#
# Adjust the parameters (such as serial or volume_id/volume_id_hex) to match your environment
# and retrieve QoS information for the desired volume.
#

data "hitachi_vsp_one_volume_qos" "volume_qos" {
  serial    = 12345
  volume_id = 678
  # or
  # volume_id_hex = "0X2A6"
}


output "volume_qos_info" {
  value = data.hitachi_vsp_one_volume_qos.volume_qos
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `serial` (Number) Serial number of the storage system.

### Optional

- `volume_id` (Number) Volume ID. Only one of volume_id or volume_id_hex may be specified, not both.
- `volume_id_hex` (String) Volume ID in hexadecimal format. Only one of volume_id or volume_id_hex may be specified, not both.

### Read-Only

- `alert_setting` (List of Object) Alert settings for the volume. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alert_setting))
- `alert_time` (List of Object) Alert times for the volume. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alert_time))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `threshold` (List of Object) Threshold settings for the volume. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--threshold))

<a id="nestedatt--alert_setting"></a>
### Nested Schema for `alert_setting`

Read-Only:

- `is_lower_alert_enabled` (Boolean)
- `is_response_alert_enabled` (Boolean)
- `is_upper_alert_enabled` (Boolean)
- `lower_alert_allowable_time` (Number)
- `response_alert_allowable_time` (Number)
- `upper_alert_allowable_time` (Number)


<a id="nestedatt--alert_time"></a>
### Nested Schema for `alert_time`

Read-Only:

- `lower_alert_time` (String)
- `response_alert_time` (String)
- `upper_alert_time` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--threshold"></a>
### Nested Schema for `threshold`

Read-Only:

- `is_lower_iops_enabled` (Boolean)
- `is_lower_transfer_rate_enabled` (Boolean)
- `is_response_priority_enabled` (Boolean)
- `is_upper_iops_enabled` (Boolean)
- `is_upper_transfer_rate_enabled` (Boolean)
- `lower_iops` (Number)
- `lower_transfer_rate` (Number)
- `response_priority` (Number)
- `target_response_time` (Number)
- `upper_iops` (Number)
- `upper_transfer_rate` (Number)
